chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 13 Pro Max has the above issue: Why was this light still shipped? Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We are currently preparing to ship the parcel and want to ensure a seamless delivery experience for our valued customer. To help us achieve this, could you kindly verify the customer's address? This simple confirmation can significantly contribute to avoiding any potential delivery delays or instances of parcels going astray. Your cooperation in this matter is greatly appreciated.

Gregor Hys

Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 Pro Max has the above problem: 
Hello I would like to cancel the purchase please because it seems unprofessional if the seller doesn't send a notification without warning. Additionally, I want to get a refund for the Backmarket service fee. I'd also be happy to buy again but I'd like to cancel this purchase.
Best regards Gregor
Thank you very much for your help,

Dear ecomobile


please cancel the order and send the money.

Regards,

Dear Backcare,

The order has been cancelled and the refund request has been processed. Thank you.
